content: the hood is turned to the right side ribbing on hood with the right side facing and using the smaller circular needle pick up starting from the bottom of the hood near the neck a total of 112 sts one stitch in from the selvage edge of the work picking up one stitch in from the edge will present an even chain of stitches on the wrong side of the work which will be used as a guide for final assembly when the hood ribbing is folded into it pm to denote eor round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * round 2 -­ 12 repeat round 1 bind off using a stretchy bind off leaving a 3 tail cut yarn finishing using a darning needle whip stitch the bound off edge of the ribbing on the hood to the selvage edge along the inside of the first stitch to create an even seam along the wrong side of the hood weave in all ends wet block or steam block your cowl and enjoy
